data.name: Maid Knight Alicia - DLC
data.detailed_description:
This DLC allows you to unlock the 18 + adult content.
It includes several sex scenes, new ends and new CGs.
data.about_the_game:
This DLC allows you to unlock the 18 + adult content.
It includes several sex scenes, new ends and new CGs.
data.short_description: This DLC allows you to unlock the 18 + adult content. It includes several sex scenes, new ends and new CGs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 3240
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains pornographic content, cartoon pornographic content and sexual assault / violence. Only for adults.
